def get_publishers():    """ Returns information for each publisher belonging to the owner. """    username = get_jwt_identity()    exists = Owner.query.filter_by(username=username).first()    if exists:        elements = Owning.query.filter_by(owner_id=username).all()        publisher_names = [e.publisher_id for e in elements]        publisher_list = []        for name in publisher_names:            publisher = Publisher.query.filter_by(publisher_name=name).first()            publisher_list.append(publisher.serialize())        return jsonify(publishers=publisher_list)    else:        return jsonify("Publisher Does Not Exist")
